pages.text: Arau tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa anugraha labhara pratyasata yadi sihamtara paraa tomara bimukha thakibalagiya'i haya, tetiya sihamtara lagata namrabharae katha kaba
Arau tumi tomara hata dinita bandhi naraakhiba arau sampurnaraupe mukali'o karai nidiba, ene karaile tumi nindaniya nihsba hai bahi paraiba
Niscaya tomara raba yara babe iccha tara jiraika brd'dhi karai diye arau yara babe iccha simita karai diye; niscaya te'om nija bandasakalara bisaye samyaka paraijnata, sarbadrasta
Abhara-anatanara bhayata tomaloke nijara santanasakalaka hatya nakaraiba. Amiye'i sihamtaka jiraika di'om arau tomalokako. Niscaya sihamtaka hatya karaa mahapapa
Arau tomaloke yinara (byabhicarara) ocaralaike'o nayaba, niscaya seya aslila arau nikrsta acarana

Arau allahe yaka hatya karaibalai nisid'dha karaiche yathartha karanabihina tomaloke taka hatya nakaraiba! Arau konoba'i an'yayabharae nihita ha’le tara uttaraadhikaraika ami tara pratisodha loraara adhikara dicho; kintu hatya samparke si yena simalanghana nakarae; niscaya si sahayyapraapta ha’ba
Arau iyatima praapta bayaska nohoraa laike sat uddesya byatita tara sampattira ocaralaike nayaba arau tomaloke pratisrauti palana karaa; niscaya pratisrauti samparke kaiphiyata talaba karaa ha’ba
Arau mapi diyara samayata purnamatraata mapi diba arau ojana karaiba sathika tulacanita, e'itorae uttama arau parainamata utkrsta
Arau yi bisaye tomara kono jnana na'i tara anusarana nakaraiba; niscaya kana, caku arau hrdaya- iyara pratyekatora bisaye kaiphiyata talaba karaa ha’ba
Arau prthiraita phutanimarai nuphuraiba, niscaya tumi ketiya'o bharairae bhuprsthaka bidirna karaiba noraaraiba arau kadapi'o parbatamana uccata labha karaiba noraaraa
E'i sakalo beya karma tomara pratipalakara ocarata ghrnaniya
